title: Pastor Fan of Peterson Answers Salty Youtube Questions Praising Prog Mainlines and Flaggy Fundies
description:
First time taking questions from the Livestream Chat.

All I can say about the title is "The Joey made me do it" :) 

Time stamps:

0:00:20  Start of transmission / announcements


0:02:42  Does Christianity entail an exclusive truth proposition?
0:05:10  What’re PVK’s thoughts on Jonathan Edwards' sermon 'Sinners in the Hands of an Angry God?’
0:08:20  Could PVK describe this little corner of the internet? 
0:16:00  What are Paul's musical influences?
0:19:55  How can a God of peace allow conflict?
0:26:00  Can PVK explain relationship of reformed theology with doctrine of divine simplicity?
0:26:35  What role confessionalism and aesthetics have, for faith formation, cultural engagement, rando converzations?
0:35:00  Is PVK happy?
0:45:00 What would Christ think of modern way of separating Christian life from "busy" life?
0:48:30  What’re PVK’s thoughts on Michael Heiser's supernatural worldview?


0:50:15  Is pope Antichrist?
0:51:25  Did PVK hear Heather and Bret talk about C.S. Lewis in their Podcast?
0:59:50  Did you know there’s a new C.S. Lewis film?
1:00:05  Why Early Christianity seems to ‘ve been communal/socialist, but now tends to be associated with conservatism?
1:04:30  When is the soonest PVK envisions a road trip; North America or Europe?
1:06:10  Does Holy Spirit fit into one of the God #1 and God #2?
1:07:10  What is the difference between Pageau-ean Patterns and Platonic Forms?
1:10:55  What should former atheist be contemplating on?
1:14:35  What to do when you know God loves you but you can't feel it?
1:16:25  Did conservative christian movement start because tax-exemption would be removed if segregation continued?


1:18:20  Is the only reason conservative Christian movement grew the threat of losing tax exemption over segregation?
1:23:05  The Blue or the Grey Psalter?
1:23:15  What do you think of A.W. Tozer,  books or talks, on the Holy Spirit?
1:23:30  What would PVK do if he could turn back the clock and go back to seminary?
1:26:25  Is the American church the modern incarnation of Jonah in Nineveh? 
1:30:45  Is it God or is it our Covenant with God that removes our defects of character?
1:31:45  How to believe in the resurrection?
1:34:25  Is it consciousnesses that is narrating the Genesis Story? 
1:34:50  How do I answer my dad who always gives God/Bible a hard time?  
1:36:30  Do you recognize Mahoney's "good war, bad peace" distinction? 


1:37:00  Are John 11 vs Kings 4 connected texts (Jesus' tarrying to save a life vs Elisha hurrying)?
1:37:40  Is that Brandon the anti-christ?
1:37:50 Will Israel play any vital role during the end times? 
1:39:25 Can nobody be evil (evil is in us)?
1:39:45  Is making the bible the "inerrant WORD of God" making it into an idol? 
1:40:05 Has PVK heard about political spat between Vaush and woman prof. Flowers?
1:41:05  PVK baby distraction 
1:41:40 Does woke religion's self-referential relationship to it's sacred texts (Butler, Hooks, etc) make it conservative'?
1:42:15  Are the "fruits of the Spirit" unique to Christians?
1:42:55  What does Christ mean when he compares the Spirit to the wind?



1:43:55  What broke the christian worldview and made reformation inevitable? 
1:48:20 Is Vatican II breaking its own law by electing Argentine Jesuit (Masonic) Pope Francis?
1:48:50  Has PVK read the Urantian Book (God 1 and 2 seem to be mentioned there in depth)?
1:49:05  Shout out to Queenie
1:49:30  How to explain faith begins with the fear of God? 
1:54:50  What is Gnosticism and how is it dangerous?
1:56:50 Does PVK plan on writing a book? 
2:00:50 Why does non-existence or end of all things, bothering me so much?
2:02:30 Could PVK recommend books on Job?
2:02:55  How did Venetian influence cause Reformation, printing of Luther’s texts, manipulation Religious wars?
2:03:45  What does it mean to Love the Lord with all your heart, with all your soul, with all your mind?

 
2:05:50  Closing remarks / End of transmission
